creditline: Gift of David Laird and Helen Lauritzen Laird
description: pin with hook at top on back for conversion into pendant; stylized figure with wings for arms and legs open, bent at knees, wearing stepped hat; wedge-shaped, bird-like tail; various colored inlays in symmetrical pattern; pin on back with safety clasp
marks: Signature on back, incised: [N I H]
title: Pin or pendant
